# Operational Performance at Airports: Opening Doors by Using Open Data

This website accompanies the paper **Operational Performance at Airports: Opening Doors by Using Open Data** to be presented at the DASC2020 conference.

As an initial step the trajectory data had been downloaded from Opensky Network.
A further comparison data set is extracted from EUROCONTROL's airport operator data flow.
